name: Bloodstained:RotN
description:
Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night is the FULL game experience, a Gothic, exploration-focused side-scrolling action RPG by Koji Igarashi, packing all of the best features you’ve come to know and love from the Metroidvania genre into a single, content-packed game.

Play as Miriam, an orphan scarred by an alchemist’s curse that slowly crystallizes her body. Battle through a demon-infested castle and defeat its master to save yourself, and all of humanity!

·Challenge over 120 Minions and Bosses and take their abilities.
·Customize your combat style with 107 weapons, 23 skills, and numerous combos.
·Sprawling and complex 2D side-scrolling map. Explore and unlock routes and barriers to discover surprises.
·Numerous fashion items for a variety of appearances and buffs.
